original_title: Two injured in separate shootings in Ja-ela and Gampaha
original_body_lines: A 43-year-old person has been injured in a shooting incident in the Makewita area of Ja-ela, a short while ago.
Meanwhile, in a separate incident, a 29-year-old person was injured in a shooting at Thammita, Gampaha this evening, the police said.
